text: The 1998 UCI Mountain Bike World Championships were held in Mont-Sainte-Anne, Quebec, Canada from 14 to 20 September 1998. The disciplines included were cross-country and downhill. The event was the 9th edition of the UCI Mountain Bike World Championships and the second to be held in Canada, following the 1992 World Championships in Bromont. ==Medal summary== ===Men's events=== {| |- |Cross-country | | | |- |Under 23 cross-country | | | |- |Junior cross- country | | | |- |Downhill | | | |- |Junior downhill | | | |} ===Women's events=== {| |- |Cross-country | | | |- |Junior cross-country | | | |- |Downhill | | | |- |Junior downhill | | | |} ===Medal table=== ==References== ==See also== *1998 UCI Mountain Bike World Cup ==External links== * Results on uci.ch Category:UCI Mountain Bike World Championships 1998 UCI Mountain Bike World Championships UCI Mountain Bike World Championships Category:Mountain biking events in Canada
title: 1998 UCI Mountain Bike World Championships
